ygData.subject: Re: The thrill of being a bard: was sonorous clounding message
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I play in fullscreen mode, thus I cannot open containers in hotkey d inventory slots. I keep my most important instruments in general slots, and just
ygData.messageBody:
At 02:33 PM 8/31/99 -0700, you wrote:
>Addendum. If you drop a container with a nodrop item in it the entire
>container will disappear.
>
>I highly recommend people keep their weapons in regular inventory slots,
>which can be hotkeyed. Then keep your instruments in a bag which can be
>on another hotkeyed inventory slot. This makes swapping a lot easier.
>Only problem might be the Battle Drum. Is it lore? I haven't played in a
>couple of weeks now so I don't remember.

I play in fullscreen mode, thus I cannot "open" containers in hotkey'd
inventory slots. I keep my most important instruments in general slots, and
just deal without for the rest.

Talies the Wanderer
